::Lord Zarak-Scorponok::

After days of warping through space Zarak had positioned Scorponok close enough to Cybertron to monitor the planet but not be detected. He learns of all the changes that have happened over the last 500 odd years that he had been frozen.

*The end of the 2nd Great Cybertronian War between the Autobots and Decepticons
*The signing of the Pax Cybertronia
*The end of Transformer/Terran/Nebulon relations
*The great upgrade that scaled Transformer life down for fuel preservation
*The evolution into Maximals and Predacons
*The Beast Wars
*The Neo Beast Wars
*The TriPredacus takeover and revolution of Cybertron
*Colonization of Past-Earth
*Maximals recently sent to aid Earth
*The start of Cybertron's 3rd Great War between the Maximals and Predacons

With all learned here that he can, Zarak plots a course for Earth.

To be continued...
